abstract: A week ahead of his 80th birthday, the exiled Tibetan spiritual leader took to the stage at the British music festival and expressed a desire to be as active as the veteran musicians around him.

headline.main: Dalai Lama Reflects on Aging at Glastonbury

snippet: A week ahead of his 80th birthday, the exiled Tibetan spiritual leader took to the stage at the British music festival and expressed a desire to be as active as the veteran musicians around him.
